messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] about Okita's photo
messages.msgSnippet: Damn I only wish the creation of a time machine for cases like this. I hate to have pics of me taken is a torture so I would not blame him. Maybe he used to
messages.messageBody:
Damn I only wish the creation of a time machine for cases like this. I hate to have pics of me taken is a torture so I would not blame him. Maybe he used to think that the flash was something like a soul absorber or energy or something of that natyre or whatever he thought. WHo knows if it is him or not, but the fact remains Ojikata Souji still is a mistery in someway and it helps to the creation of legends,fables and myths. People like him and the rest of shisengumi where real but we only have only small things about each of the ppl in it as individuals but as a group... there reputation still presided them.
Anyone wants to contribute,lol!

Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> escribió:
When I was looking up information on him, I ran into a number of sites that claimed that the photo isn't him (one site claimed it was a Kabuki actor of about the same time dressed up as him). Appearently, those photos have no way of being proven that it was Okita. As far as I've read, there is no knowledge that Okita ever did pose for a photograph (itwould be good if someone could answer this for me).

Thats not to say the photo isn't him... its more like I'm in the same boat as you are and have no clue whether that really was him or not.

messages.subject: Re: about Okita's photo
messages.msgSnippet: ... sites that claimed that the photo isn t him (one site claimed it was a Kabuki actor of about the same time dressed up as him) You re referring to the photo
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@y...> wrote:
> When I was looking up information on him, I ran into a number of
sites that claimed that the photo isn't him (one site claimed it was a
Kabuki actor of about the same time dressed up as him)

You're referring to the photo farthest to the left on this page:

http://www.shinsengumihq.com/photos.htm

The other is the one we think is the "real" Okita.

Barb Sheridan

messages.subject: about Okita's photo
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, i saw in the web of shinsengumi headquarters a photo of okita souji, that i had also seen in another page related to this web called bakumatsu i think.
messages.messageBody:
Hi, i saw in the web of shinsengumi headquarters a photo of okita
souji, that i had also seen in another page related to this web called
'bakumatsu'i think. I'm very interested in how accurate this picture
is and how it was found.... if anyone can give me any information, i
would be thankful. I have been gathering information of this guy for
many years and it really surprised me.

Kirimarou.
